recommendations: Neelaksh Chauhan ‚ÄúWorking with Shivangi has been an absolute pleasure. She has an impressive ability to quickly grasp new skills and technologies, seamlessly adapting to whatever the situation demands. Shivangi consistently took ownership of tasks, managing them end-to-end with minimal guidance. Beyond her technical abilities, she's just one of those people who are a joy to work with‚Äîalways positive and easygoing. Shivangi is truly a valuable team member.‚Äù

Saurabh Singh ‚ÄúShivangi effectively led end-to-end projects, delivering significant results and key deliverables for the team. The ownership she showcased was commendable which is rare in people new to the industry. As a key member of the team, the technical expertise she demonstrated was strong, showcasing her technical skills by working on projects aimed at enhancing system security and streamlining the user login process. She was able to effectively tackle technically complex and critical projects like developing advanced security systems for fraud detection and automated operational tasks to reduce manual intervention.‚Äù
